item.description:
Hey everyone! Now that the weather is getting a little nicer I was thinking that it would be nice to get some exercise. Unfortunately the dogs can NOT be off leash but they can still intermingle & socialize while they get some exercise

We can park & meet where the trail starts by the Pump house. I will be waiting near the bathrooms
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one w/ the Shiba :o)
item.why: Weather permitting it would be some GREAT exercise for everyone ( including the Inu's)

group.name: Shiba Inu Meet Up of Eastern MA & Southern NH

item.name: Let's walk the dogs
